title: BUG: Auto-save does not fire — no network requests, no indicator, content lost on refresh
description:
Auto-save is completely non-functional on staging (commit d2c4e67). Typing in the strategy editor produces no save indicator, fires no PUT/PATCH network requests to /api/playbook, and Cmd+S has no effect. Content typed into the editor is lost on page refresh. API confirms version is unchanged after edits.

### Steps to Reproduce
1. Login to staging, navigate to /visionvolve/playbook
2. Click into the strategy editor
3. Type any text (e.g., 'Testing auto-save feature')
4. Wait 5+ seconds — no 'Saving...' or 'Saved' indicator appears
5. Press Cmd+S — no effect
6. Check Network tab in DevTools — no PUT/PATCH to /api/playbook
7. Refresh the page — typed content is gone

### Expected
- 'Saving...' indicator appears ~1.5s after typing stops
- Network PUT request fires to /api/playbook
- Content persists after page refresh
- Cmd+S triggers immediate save

### Actual
- No indicator, no network requests, no persistence
- The Save button was correctly removed (that part works)

### Root Cause Hypothesis
Auto-save code from PR #36 (feature/playbook-autosave) may not be deployed to staging, or the debounced save handler is not wired to the editor's onChange event.
